email0.Title: Please read this email
email0.Body: Please click this link and log in with your password to unlock your account. If you do not act within 2 hours, your data will be deleted.

email1.Title: Immediate Action Required: Update Account Details
email1.Body: Update your credentials now or your access will be terminated permanently.
email1.Footer: Please follow the this link: https://bankChangeWebsite.real.com

email2.Title: New Internal Mentorship Program
email2.Body: We are launching a mentorship program connecting junior and senior staff. Please sign up if interested.
email2.Footer: Deadline for registration is next week.

email3.Title: Coffee Morning Announcement
email3.Body: Join us for a casual coffee morning on Friday. No RSVP required.

email4.Title: HR Request: Please send your personal credentials
email4.Body: We need copies of your passport, bank statements and NI number to complete onboarding.

email5.Title: Security Notice: Unusual login detected
email5.Body: We detected an unusual login. Please verify your login credentials immediately to avoid temporary suspension.
email5.Footer: If this is not done within 48 hours your account will be temporarily disabled.

email6.Title: Action Required: Confirm Bank Details
email6.Body: We’ve detected an issue with payroll. Please send your bank account and sort code immediately to avoid delayed payment.

email7.Title: Exclusive Warwick Internship — Apply Now
email7.Body: We're hosting an on-campus assessment. No form filling required — just reply with your CV if interested.

email18.Title: Immediate Action Required
email18.Body: An administrative hold will be placed on your account within 1 hour. Follow the enclosed link and enter your credentials to prevent suspension.

email9.Title: Invitation: Internal technical talk
email9.Body: Join us next Tuesday for an internal talk on system design followed by Q&A.
email9.Footer: No action required to attend; calendar invite attached.
